name: Circular Shooter
description:
REQUIRES JAVA TO BE INSTALLED

It's a quick paced game with basic wave shooting. This game was made inside a program called processing3, the game has raw image files available so you can change the images for the player and enemies to your hearts content.

This game was made for the 10MB Challenge Game Jam!

Controls-

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Aim with mouse
  • Shoot with left mouse button
